sen.j: 藤原 惟通（ふじわら の のぶみち、生年不詳 - 寛仁4年7月3日 (旧暦)（1020年7月25日））は、平安時代中期の官人。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Nobumichi (year of birth unknown-July 31, 1020) was a government official (lower or middle ranked) in the mid Heian period.
sen.cmt: 「寛仁4年7月3日 (旧暦) 」＝グレゴリオ暦「西暦1020年7月31日」、出典：http://maechan.net/kanreki
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Nobumichi (year of birth unknown-July 31, 1020) was a government official (lower or middle ranked) during the mid Heian period.

sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。

sen.e: He was on FUJIWARA no Toshimoto line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
He was a member of the FUJIWARA no Toshimoto line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
He was a member of the FUJIWARA no Toshimoto line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.

sen.j: 越後国守藤原為時の子。
sen.e: He was a child of Echigo no kuni no kami (Provincial Governor of Echigo) FUJIWARA no Tametoki.
He was a child of Echigo no kuni no kami (Provincial Governor of Echigo) FUJIWARA no Tametoki.
He was a child of Echigo no kuni no kami (Governor of Echigo Province) FUJIWARA no Tametoki.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.e: His mother was unknown.
His mother was unknown.
His mother was unknown.

sen.j: 藤原惟規・紫式部らの異母弟。
sen.e: He was paternal half-brother of FUJIWARA no Nobunori, Shikibu MURASAKI and so on.
He was the paternal half-brother of FUJIWARA no Nobunori, Shikibu MURASAKI and so on.
He was the younger paternal half-brother of FUJIWARA no Nobunori, Murasaki Shikibu and so on.
sen.cmt: 補足し、用語集に合わせました。

sen.e: He was Jugoi (Junior Fifth Rank) Aki-kokushu (the Lord of Aki Province).
He was Jugoi (Junior 5th Rank) Aki-kokushu (the Lord of Aki Province).
He was Jugoi (Junior Fifth Rank) Aki kokushu (Governor of Aki Province).
sen.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 寛仁3年（1019年）7月、常陸国介に任ぜられ、翌寛仁4年（1020年）7月3日に任地で卒去した。
sen.e: He was appointed Hitachi no kuni no suke (the Lord of Hitachi Province) in August 1019 and died on July 31 of the following year 1020 during his stay at his post.
sen.cmt: 「寛仁3年7月」＝グレゴリオ暦「西暦1019年8月10日 」、「翌寛仁4年（1020年）7月3日」＝グレゴリオ暦「西暦1020年7月31日」出典：http://maechan.net/kanreki
sen.e: He was appointed Hitachi no kuni no suke (Lord of Hitachi Province) in August 1019 and died on July 31 of the following year 1020 during while at his post.
He was appointed Hitachi no kuni no suke (Assistant Governor of Hitachi Province) in August 1019 and died on July 31 of the following year 1020 during while at his post.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 享年不詳だが、40代前半だったと思われる。
sen.e: Although his age at death was unknown, it is understood to have been in his early forties.
Although his age at death was unknown, it is understood to have been in his early forties.
Although his age at death was unknown, it is understood to have been in his early 40's.
sen.cmt: アラビア数字にしました。

sen.j: 惟通が没した後も、彼の母（式部の継母にあたる）と妻子は帰京せずに常陸国にとどまった。
sen.e: Even after Nobumichi's death, his mother (stepmother of Shikibu) and his family did not return to Kyoto and stayed in Hitachi Province.
Even after Nobumichi's death, his mother (stepmother of Shikibu) and his family did not return to Kyoto and stayed in Hitachi Province.
Even after Nobumichi's death, his mother (stepmother of Shikibu) and his family did not return to Kyoto and stayed in Hitachi Province.

sen.j: これは常陸国に惟通とその一族が所有する荘園があったことを意味している。
sen.e: It means that there was Shoen (manor in medieval Japan) which Nobumichi and his family possessed in Hitachi Province.

sen.j: 惟通が没した年の寛仁4年（1020年）閏12月26日、惟通の未亡人が平為幹に強姦されるという事件が起こった。
sen.e: On February 16, 1021, the year when Nobumichi died, an incident in which Nobumichi's widow was sexually assaulted by TAIRA no Tamemoto occurred.
sen.cmt: 「寛仁4年閏12月26日」＝グレゴリオ暦「西暦1021年2月16日」、出典：http://maechan.net/kanreki
sen.e: On February 16, 1021, the year when Nobumichi died, an incident in which Nobumichi's widow was sexually assaulted by TAIRA no Tamemoto occurred.
On February 16, 1021 (December (leap month) 26, 1020 in old lunar calendar), the year when Nobumichi died, an incident in which Nobumichi's widow was sexually assaulted by TAIRA no Tamemoto occurred.
sen.cmt: 前出で没年は1020年となっているため、旧暦も補足しました。

sen.j: 惟通の母の訴えにより、為幹は逮捕されて身柄を拘束されたが、翌年には赦免されている。
sen.e: On complaint of Nobumichi's mother, Tamemoto was arrested and taken into custody, but pardoned in the following year.
